name: Club Scenario
description:
Simulate fast-paced Texas Hold 'em poker tournaments with a simple "limit" betting interface. Tournaments follow a "shootout" structure. Win one of nine tables in Round 1 to advance to the Final Table — where you could win it all!

This is a native iOS version of our two-time #1 downloaded Scenario Poker™ Dashboard widget — a former Macworld Widget of the Month.

You can play this universal app on your iPhone, iPod touch or iPad with graphics optimized for each screen.

Club Scenario uses Apple's Game Center service to track your performance against other players. Club Scenario is a simulation. It does not enable actual gambling or online play.

Club Scenario allows you to simulate playing against people from your device's Contacts. To enable this custom feature, you must have at least 18 Contacts on your device with photos assigned to them. If you put them in a Contacts group named "Poker Players," they will be favored over the rest of your Address Book.

Enjoy!
